page.title: 18MENSTRIE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Menstrie Primary School is situated near the centre of the village. It was built in 1978 and officially opened in 1979. The school caters for children from 5-12 years. Basic subjects are taught by a staff of 11 teachers. The school has several after school activities including:recorder lessons and country dancing. Each year in October a group of children travel to another part of the country for a week's holiday. The school uniform consists of a black blazer, grey trousers/skirt, grey pullover and a school tie.
